page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I am Michael Costain. On Sunday I got up, dressed, had my breakfast then I went for the paper with Philip Lamoury. Then I played knock out cricket. We went to Mass at Lancaster University at 11.30am. Then we went to MR. Kelly's house to tune my guitar. We had dinner then we went to the playing field to play football. I cycled to Dominic Kelly's house to play on our bikes with Clara Blunt. After tea we played football. Then I went on a bicycle ride with mum and dad. After a bath I read then went to sleep. I am Angela Curwen. I get up at 7.00am. I make breakfast, watch T.V., dress and go to school 4 miles away. At school we say prayers, read, do maths, watch T.V. and learn English. After school I play out, have my tea watch Coronation Street and Brookside then go to bed.
